DOC.brief_summary: In patients naive to treatment or after a 2-week washout period for patients whose treatment was ineffective, the use of olmesartan was assessed in a 4-phase treatment scheme: monotherapy, addition of hydrochlorothiazide (2 phases), addition of amlodipine.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Olmesartan Medoxomil in Stage 1 and 2 Essential Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Stage 1 and 2 hypertension without treatment for at least 2 weeks Women with no risk of becoming pregnant Study participation could result in risk to health of subject Cardiovascular disease Secondary hypertension or stage 3 hypertension Myocardial infarction within the last 6 months Congestive heart failure Pulmonary edema Valvular alterations or rheumatic cardiopathy Clinically relevant conduction disorders significant arrhythmias Alcohol or illicit drug use Medication abuse Pregnant or nursing women
